"
 Metabolism is the chemical reactions in the body's cells that change food into energy. Our bodies need this energy to do everything from moving to thinking to growing. Specific proteins in the body control the chemical reactions of metabolism. Here we use equation of Harris-Benedict. The BMR value is your daily calories 1. Enter your weight in kg.
 2. Enter your length in cm.
 3. Enter your age. 
 4. Enter your style of life 
 5. Enter your gender 
 6. Click button CALCULATE. 
 7. You should see digits on top, this is your BMI and BMR 
 8. BMI is index of your mass and BMR is level of calories per day 
 9.Under the button CALCULATE, you should see a tip, what BMI is recommended in that ages. 
 10.For better view, under this tip, you should see visual bar. 
 11.Menu button SAVE saves your result in phone memory. 
 12.Menu button HISTORY reveals your result from phone's memory. 
 13.Menu button HISTORY CLEAR delete all information, previously saved, but app will ask you before 
 14.Menu button SHARE shares your result. Either current data, or saved data
 15.Menu button Sign Up - in work, wait for future versions 
 16.Menu button ? - this text ENJOY!!
